summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing construction of Contract No. 1 of the Queen Anne West, Unit 1, Sewer Improvement Project for the separation of existing combined sewers in the area on the west side of Queen Anne Hill generally bounded by Elliott Bay on the south, West Dravus Street on the north, 7th Avenue West on the east, and Piers 90 and 91 and Burlington-Northern Railroad tracks on the west, and making an appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund therefor.
